flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction: The Yard Walker is designed to be user constructed in a few days using local materials, tools and skills from one used bicycle, two wheels, wood, bolts and screws for about the cost of a new bicycle anywhere in the world. Since you build the Yard Walker yourself or with friends it is optimized to your specific dimensions, abilities, desires and environment.
guide.introduction_rendered: The Yard Walker is designed to be user constructed in a few days using local materials, tools and skills from one used bicycle, two wheels, wood, bolts and screws for about the cost of a new bicycle anywhere in the world. Since you build the Yard Walker yourself or with friends it is optimized to your specific dimensions, abilities, desires and environment.
guide.summary: This guide will help you to build your own customized yard walker to make gardening easier, safer and more productive.
guide.title: Yard Walker
